irregularities_identified.description: Additional repair payment of $500.00 to ABC Auto Body exceeds the approved repair amount after deductible.
irregularities_identified.calculation_method: The approved repair amount was $4,850.00 with a $1,000 deductible, resulting in an authorized payment of $3,850.00. An additional payment of $500.00 was made, totaling $4,350.00, which exceeds the authorized amount.

irregularities_identified.description: Extended rental payment of $90.00 for 3 additional days exceeds the approved rental car coverage.
irregularities_identified.calculation_method: The approved rental car coverage was for 7 days at $30/day, totaling $210.00. An additional payment of $90.00 was made for 3 extra days, which was not authorized.

recommended_actions: Code A1: Contact service provider to request refund
Code A2: Adjust future payments to recover overpayment
scenario_1.justification: The total overpayment amount is $590.00, which falls between $250 and $1,000, classifying it as medium priority.

irregularities_identified.description: Duplicate payment of $440.00 to Citywide Medical Center for services on 02/10/2023.
irregularities_identified.calculation_method: The insurance payment of $440.00 was authorized and paid on 02/20/2023. A duplicate payment of the same amount was made on 03/05/2023.

recommended_actions: Code A1: Contact service provider to request refund
Code A3: Send formal recovery letter
scenario_2.justification: The duplicate payment of $440.00 falls between $250 and $1,000, classifying it as medium priority.

irregularities_identified.description: Payment of $5,200.00 to Luxury Bath Solutions for bathroom renovation, which is not covered under the policy.
irregularities_identified.calculation_method: The policy excludes coverage for bathroom renovations unless directly damaged by a covered peril. The payment was made for a renovation not related to the covered water damage.

recommended_actions: Code C1: Contact insured to explain coverage limitations
Code C2: Request refund from provider
scenario_3.justification: The non-covered service payment of $5,200.00 exceeds $1,000, classifying it as high priority.
